main event: A brilliant light was observed at Camp Hood, Texas on May 6, 1949.
interesting points: The object appeared pinkish to green and was round in shape., It seemed to be constantly spinning and alternated between red, green, and white., The object was visible for about 50 minutes and moved very slowly., The apparent size of the object diminished from the size of a half dollar to a quarter at arm's length., No sound or odor was reported, and it faded from view at the end of the observation.
sighted object: a brilliant light that appeared pinkish to green
witness description: Lt. ██████████, Task Force Commander, USA Officer
